texto: developed by the supplier. b) Advertise the acquisition and select the supplier. This activity consists of the following tasks: 1) Communicate the request for the supply of a product or service to potential suppliers; and 2) Select one or more suppliers. NOTE To obtain competitive solicitations, proposals to supply are evaluated and compared against the selection criteria and ranked. The justification for rating each proposal is declared and suppliers commonly are informed why they were or were not selected. c) Establish and maintain an agreement.
